name: Python
flavor_text: "If they let you get that close, they deserve it." —The Drifter

frame.name: Aggressive Frame
frame.description: Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo automatically loads this weapon beyond normal capacity.
perks.name: Overflow

perks.description: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.
perks.name: Shield Disorient
